sentences.sentence: The company has also scaled up the aerostat itself to the 18-metre-wide Vikki.
sentences.translation: 该公司还将Betty按比例放大到了18米，命名为Vikki。

sentences.sentence: During the testing, MONAX streamed real time video from the aerostat camera to COTS smartphones within the coverage area.
sentences.translation: 在测试过程中，MONAX系统将航空器平台相机上的实时视频传输到覆盖范围内的COTS智能手机。

sentences.sentence: GBOSS represents an upgrade of the Rapid Aerostat Initial Deployment (RAID) system now widely used in both Iraq and Afghanistan.
sentences.translation: GBOSS是快速初始部署浮空器(RAID)系统的升级系统，目前广泛应用于伊拉克和阿富汗地区。
